casebody.data:
PEOPLE of the State of Michigan, Plaintiff-Appellee,
v.
Derrick Daniel DAVIS, Defendant-Appellant. SC: 157824
COA: 335155 Supreme Court of Michigan. June 1, 2018

Order

On order of the Chief Justice, the motion of defendant-appellant to file a pro per supplement to the application for leave to appeal is GRANTED. The supplement submitted on May 24, 2018, is accepted for filing.
